analysis.description:
PDATAToken.startDate (/unique_contracts/0x03b6609aaceccec42ef526a35b1bd5d728874ea4.sol#99-100) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0x03b6609aaceccec42ef526a35b1bd5d728874ea4.sol#205-217)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x03b6609aaceccec42ef526a35b1bd5d728874ea4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x03b6609aaceccec42ef526a35b1bd5d728874ea4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x03b6609aaceccec42ef526a35b1bd5d728874ea4.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
